Text.Page:
Poor Jermir moans in his sleep from pain.

But there's a flower in Barbtail Coulee called salixia. The wyverns eat it when they're ill. I wonder if it would help him?

, will you get some for me? For Jermir's sake?
Thank you! I'll feed some to him directly he wakes up. I'm sure he'll soon be his old self.
Jermir will be on the mend as soon as I can give him enough salixia.
